SEARCH
Module com.example.project4
Package com.example.project4.model

Class Combo

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4.model.MenuItem
com.example.project4.model.Combo
public class Combo extends MenuItem
Represents a combo meal, consisting of a sandwich, a beverage, and a side. The combo also includes a quantity and calculates the total price based on the components and quantity.
Author:
Yakelin Melendez-Gonzalez, Nivedha Sundar

  • Constructor Details

    • Combo

      public Combo(Sandwich sandwich, Beverage drink, Side side, int quantity)
      Constructs a Combo object with a sandwich, drink, side, and quantity.
      Parameters:
      sandwich - The sandwich in the combo.
      drink - The beverage in the combo.
      side - The side item in the combo.
      quantity - The quantity of the combo meals.

  • Method Details

    • price

      public double price()
      Calculates the price of the combo meal. The price of the sandwich, beverage, and side is summed up, and a $2.00 surcharge is added to the total. The result is then multiplied by the quantity.
      Specified by:
      price in class MenuItem
      Returns:
      The total price of the combo meal.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the combo meal, including the quantity, sandwich details, side details, drink details, and total price.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representing the combo meal.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this combo meal to another object for equality. Two combos are considered equal if they have the same quantity, sandwich, drink, and side.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare this combo meal to.
      Returns:
      true if the two combo meals are equal, false otherwise.

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code for this combo meal based on its sandwich, drink, side, and quantity.
